ModMetaData.name: WM Self launching pods
ModMetaData.author: Wishmaster
ModMetaData.description: Requires HugsLib. Adds a new self launching pod. This pod does not need its own launcher, has a fuel tank and can take off from anywhere ! Useful to travel to a nearby village trade and come back quick. Also allows you to reuse vanilla pods. Target your pods within 20 tiles of a Pod Launcher. One pod launcher is required for every arriving pods. Remaining pods drop elsewhere nearby and vanish. The beacon has been removed in the A17 version.
